attributes.action: We the people wish for this petition be addressed to her Majesty the queen.
attributes.background: We the people whom took a democratic vote, which was granted by parliament and Mr cameron. As was article 50. Call upon her majesty the queen in this rare instance to restore confidence in parliament and democracy. From those who wish to overthrow the democratic will of the people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
